GDevelop jẹ́ ètò orísun-gbangba kan fún ṣíṣẹ̀dá eré. Ó lè jẹ́ lílò nípasẹ̀ ẹnikẹ́ni láti ṣẹ̀dá èyíkéyìí irú àwọn eré 2D.
This website in your language: Ààyè ayélujára yìí ní èdè rẹ
Use JavaScript with the game engine: Lo JavaScript pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rọ eré náà
GDevelop was created with love by: GDevelop gba ṣíṣẹ̀dá pẹ̀lú ìfẹ́ nípasẹ̀
who added features, fixed bugs, sent new: tó ṣàfikún àwọn ẹyà, ṣàtúnṣe àwọn ìyọnu, fi àwọn àpẹẹrẹ tuntun ránṣẹ́, kọ àwọn àlàyé, àti ran àwùjọ náà lọ́wọ́.
BUB is a very special, one of a kind cri: BUB is a very special, one of a kind critter. More specifically, she is the [most amazing cat on the planet](http://lilbub.com)... and her game is made with GDevelop!
The game is a retro 8-bit game, with bea: The game is a retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, which alternates between platformers levels, with hidden secrets, and shooter levels with bosses, multiple enemies and bonuses.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies.
As your intergalactic intervention missi: As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Imagine and publish your games with GDev: Gbèrò nípa kí o sì ṣàtẹ̀jáde àwọn eré rẹ pẹ̀lú GDevelop. Tí a kójọ pọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn àlàyé àti àwọn àpẹẹrẹ.
Contribute to GDevelop - Open-source HTM: Dá sí GDevelop - Irinṣẹ́ orísun-gbangba fún ṣíṣẹ̀dá eré HTML5
GDevelop is an open-source project (even: GDevelop jẹ́ iṣẹ́ orísun-gbangba kan (kódà ààyè ayélujára yìí): ẹnikẹ́ni le dá sí àti ṣàtúnṣe ètò náà!
There are multiple ways you can contribu: Oríṣiríṣi ọ̀nà ló wà tí o lè gbà láti dá sí GDevelop, tó dá lórí àkókò rẹ, àwọn ìmọ̀ rẹ àti ohun tí o nífẹ̀ẹ́ sí.
GDevelop and the website can be translat: GDevelop àti ààyè ayélujára náà lè gbà ìtumọ̀ ní èdè rẹ! Àwọn ìtumọ̀ náà jẹ́ ṣíṣe lórí ààyè ayélujára kan níbi tí gbogbo èèyàn lè kópa.
Help us by translating GDevelop!: Ràn wá lọ́wọ́ nípasẹ̀ ìpèsè ìtumò GDevelop!
Help to develop GDevelop: Ṣe ìrànlọ́wọ́ láti mú ìdàgbàsókè GDevelop
It's easy to get the source code of GDev: Ó rọrùn láti gba kóòdù orísun ti GDevelop kí o sì bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní ṣàtúnṣe àwọn nnkan!
Edit the website on GitHub: Ṣàtúnṣe ààyè ayélujára náà lórí GitHub
The forum and the Discord chat are the p: Àpérò náà àti ìtàkúrọ̀sọ Discord náà jẹ́ ààyè láti gba àti pèsè ìrànlọ́wọ́ fún àwọn aṣàmúlò GDevelop míìràn!
Follow GDevelop on Facebook and Twitter:: Tẹ̀lé GDevelop lórí Facebook àti Twitter:
Write tutorials, record videos: Kọ àwọn àlàyé, ká àwọn fídíò sílẹ̀
For most beginners and even advanced use: Fún ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn alákoọ́bẹ̀rẹ̀ kódà àti àwọn aṣàmúlò àgbà, àwọn àlàyé àti ojúewé ìrànlọ́wọ́ jẹ́ èròjà iṣẹ́ tó wúlò jù láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn eré ńlá ní kíákíá. Lórí wiki náà, o lè kọ àwọn àlàyé tàbí ṣàtúnṣe àwọn tó wà nílẹ̀.
Download GDevelop or try it online - cre: Gba GDevelop tàbí gbìyànjú rẹ̀ lórí ayélujára - ṣẹ̀dá àwọn eré láì nílò kóòdù
GDevelop is free and can be used for pro: GDevelop is free and can be used for profit or non-profit game making.
GDevelop runs on Windows, macOS and most: GDevelop ma ṣiṣẹ́ lórí Windows, macOS àti ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn pínpín Linux àìpẹ́. O tún lè gbìyànjú rẹ̀ lórí ayélujára pẹ̀lú lílo Chrome, Firefox tàbí aṣàwákiri ayélujára àìpẹ́ míìràn.
You need **libgconf-2-4** on your system: O nílò **libgconf-2-4** lórí ètò rẹ. Tẹ `sudo apt-get install libgconf-2-4` sínú terminal kan tàbí ṣàgbékalẹ̀ rẹ láti alákòóso àkójọpọ̀ rẹ.
To create your first game, start by read: Láti ṣẹ̀dá eré àkọ́kọ́ rẹ, bẹ̀rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú kíka àlàyé kan:

GDevelop is an open-source project. You: GDevelop jẹ́ iṣẹ́ orísun-gbangba kan. O lè kópa nínú àwùjọ náà láti ṣàtúnṣe rẹ̀!
Learn how to contribute: Kọ́ bí o ṣe lè dá sí
Gdevelop 4 can still be downloaded. GDev: GDevelop 4 ṣì lè jẹ́ gbígbà. GDevelop 5 ní a dámọ̀ràn fún èyíkéyìí aṣàmúlò tuntun nítorí pé GDevelop 4 kò ní gba ìmúdójúìwọ̀n mọ́! A kò ní pèsè àtìlẹ́yìn ní ọjọ́ iwájú fún GDevelop 4: a dámọ̀ràn kí èyíkéyìí aṣàmúlò GDevelop 4 ṣe ìmúdójúìwọ̀n sí GDevelop 5.
Even if GDevelop 4 supports native games: Kódà tí GDevelop 4 bá n ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn àwọn eré abínibí, a dámọ̀ràn yíyí padà sí GDevelop 5 àti àwọn eré HTML5, èyí tó ní àtìlẹ́yìn tó dára. Àwọn eré abínibí yíò gba àfikún sí GDevelop 5 nígbà tó yá.
GDevelop for the education - Teach game: GDevelop fún ẹ̀kọ́ náà - Kọ́ ṣíṣẹ̀dá eré
Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect: Using GDevelop in classroom is a perfect opportunity to teach programming, game making and unleash students creativity.
GDevelop has already been used in classr: GDevelop tí n jẹ́ lílò nínú àwọn iyàrá ìkàwé àti àwọn ẹ̀kọ́ orí ayélujára, pẹ̀lú àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ digital media tàbí àwọn ọmọdé ní ilé-ìwé alákọ̀ọ́bẹ̀rẹ̀!
Please send us your photos and tweets if: Jọ̀wọ́ fi àwọn fọ́tò àti àwọn tweet rẹ ránṣẹ́ sí wa tí o bá n lo GDevelop fún ẹ̀kọ́ kan!
Make your own Facebook Instant Games wit: Ṣẹ̀dá àwọn Eré Ẹsẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ Facebook tìrẹ pẹ̀lú GDevelop - ṣàtẹ̀jáde àwọn eré rẹ lórí Messenger
Make games for Facebook Messenger: Ṣẹ̀dá àwọn eré fún Facebook Messenger
With GDevelop, you can export your game: Pẹ̀lú GDevelop, o lè ṣàgbéjáde eré rẹ gẹ́gẹ́ bí Eré Ẹsẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ Facebook ní àwọn títẹ̀ 2.
1) Create your app on Facebook Developer: 1) Ṣẹ̀dá ètò rẹ lórí Facebook Developers
First thing, make sure to have an accoun: Nnkan àkọ́kọ́, ri dájú pé o ní account kan lórí **Facebook Developers**. Ṣẹ̀dá ètò kan kí o ṣètò rẹ̀ láti yan "àwọn Eré" gẹ́gẹ́ bí ìsòrí rẹ̀ àti kí o fi ààyè gba àwọn Eré Ẹsẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ nínú àwọn Èròjà:
2) Open GDevelop and export for Facebook: 2) Ṣí GDevelop kí o ṣàgbéjáde fún àwọn Eré Ẹsẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ Facebook
In GDevelop, open your game and then the: Nínú GDevelop, ṣí eré rẹ àti fèrèsé Àgbéjáde lẹ́yìn náà. Mú **Àwọn Eré Ẹsẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ Facebook**, tẹ orí Ṣàgbéjáde kí o dúró fún ìṣẹ́jú àáyá díẹ̀.
3) Upload your game: 3) Gbé eré rẹ jáde sórí ayélujára
Go back to your game page on Facebook De: Padà sí ojúewé eré rẹ lórí Facebook Developers, yan Ìpèsè lórí Ayélujára nínú àkójọ àṣàyàn náà kí o **gbé fáìlì náà jáde sórí ayélujára** èyí tí a ṣàgbéjáde nípasẹ̀ GDevelop.
You can also add testers to let your fri: O lè tún ṣàfikún àwọn olùgbéyẹ̀wò láti jẹ́ kí àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ gbìyànjú eré rẹ.
More about uploading your game: Àfikún nípa gbígbé eré rẹ jáde sórí ayélujára
Now, get your phone and **open messenger: Ní báyìí, mú ẹ̀rọ aláàgbéká rẹ kí o **ṣí messenger**. Ṣí ìjíròrò kan, yan Àwọn eré kí o tẹ ààmì eré rẹ náà láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní gba!
5) Use Instant Games features and publis: 5) Lo àwọn ẹyà àwọn Eré Ẹsẹ̀kẹsẹ̀ kí o ṣàtẹ̀jáde eré rẹ!
GDevelop gave you access to Instant Game: GDevelop fún ẹ láàyè sí àwọn ẹyà pàtó ti àwọn Eré Ẹsẹ̀kẹsẹ̀, bíi orúkọ eléré náà, láti mú àjọṣepọ̀ tó dára fún eré rẹ nínú àwọn ìjíròrò Messenger.
When your game is ready, submit it for r: Nígbà tí eré rẹ bá setan, fi ṣọwọ́ fún àtúnyẹ̀wò nípasẹ̀ Facebook kí o lè **wà káàkiri àgbáyé**!

Publish your game on Kongregate, Itch.io: Ṣàtẹ̀jáde eré rẹ lórí Kongregate, Itch.io àti ààyè ayélujára eré gbígbá míìràn!

Design your own levels with the scene ed: Ya àwòrán àwọn ìpele tìẹ pẹ̀lú olóòtú ìran náà: o lè yan àwọn ohun èlò, gbé wọn sórí ìran náà, ṣàtúnṣe ipò àti ìwọ̀n wọn. O lè yàwòrán àwọn ìpele rẹ lápapọ̀ pẹ̀lú olóòtú ìran náà. Tí o bá fẹ́ ṣẹ̀dá àwọn ìpele tó ṣòro tàbí àwọn atọ́kùn, àwọn àgbékalẹ̀ ìta náà yíò fún ẹ láàyè láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn apá kan lára ìpele kan àti kí o tún wọn lò nínú àwọn ìran míìràn.

Imagining and creating the rule of your: Imagining and creating the rule of your game does not imply to learn the syntax of a complex programming language. The events editor displays a sheet of events: each events is composed of conditions and actions. When conditions are fulfilled, actions are run. It's that simple.
All conditions and actions are available: Àwọn ipò àti àwọn iṣẹ́ wà nínú àkójọ kan kó lè rọrùn fún ẹ láti ṣàwárí àti wá ohun tí o fẹ́ fi ṣe àwọn òfin eré rẹ.

Púpọ̀ nínú àwọn ohun èlò ni a npè ní àwọn sprite: wọ́n jẹ́ àkójọ àwọn àwòrán abẹ̀mí àti pé wọ́n lè jẹ́ lílò fún èyíkéyìí element àwòrán abẹ̀mí. Fún àpẹrẹ, eléré rẹ, àwọn ọ̀tá tàbí àwọn bonus láti mú.
Other object are also available to creat: Àwọn ohun èlò mìíràn tún wà láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn atọ́kùn tàbí ṣàfikún àwọn ipa sí eré rẹ: àwọn ọ̀rọ̀, àwọn particle, àwọn tiled sprite...

All the images and audio files used in y: Gbogbo àwọn àwòrán àti àwọn fáìlì ohùn tó jẹ́ lílò nínú eré rẹ ni a kójọ sínú Olóòtú àwọn Èròjà iṣẹ́ náà. Ó jẹ́ ọ̀nà kan tó rọrùn láti ṣàkóso àwọn ohun-ìní eré rẹ.

Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created wit: Hyperspace Dogfights, a game created with GDevelop
A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made: A juicy jet-combat roguelike game, made with GDevelop.
Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-comb: Hyperspace Dogfights is a juicy jet-combat roguelike in which you'll blast, dodge and slice your way through masses of technologically inferior enemies. As your intergalactic intervention mission progresses, your adaptive hyper-jet will evolve into something stronger and weirder by gathering some of the hundreds of items available in the game.
Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side pro: Hyperspace Dogfights began as a side project to our now canceled space exploration roguelike Hyperspace Admirals. HDog was prototyped in late 2016, after which it received a limited early access release on itch.io. Over the course of 2017 the majority of its content was developed and continuous alpha feedback was taken into account. The game was feature-complete in march 2018, after which the release was announced.
Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against m: Fierce and juicy 2d jet combat against masses of air and ground based enemies
Hundreds of stackable passives, over fif: Hundreds of stackable passives, over fifty weapons and actives; all geared towards producing weird synergies with another
High replayability, your will evolve a l: High replayability, your will evolve a little different on each run
Seven zones with distinct enemy composit: Seven zones with distinct enemy composition to explore
5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming: 5+ Player hyper-jets to fly, all coming with unlockable mk2 loadouts
16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks b: 16 chilled, multi-layered music tracks by Enuit and Ole Toensen
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created wi: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH, a game created with GDevelop
A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts: A retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, made with GDevelop.
Using GDevelop, the game was made availa: Using GDevelop, the game was made available for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS, Linux and even published as a real Arcade game.
The game was announced for BUB's 5th bir: The game was announced for BUB's 5th birthday. To help making it a reality, a Kickstarter was launched so that all BUB's friends around the world can contribute. The kickstarter was initially launched with $100,000 as the goal, but reached $148,000! GOOD JOB BUB.
Huge variety of unique levels, bosses an: Huge variety of unique levels, bosses and enemies
Unique storyline with twists and surpris: Unique storyline with twists and surprises

GDevelop - Create games without programm: GDevelop - Ṣẹ̀dá àwọn eré láìsí lílo kóòdù - Ètò orísun gbangba fún ṣíṣẹ̀dá eré HTML5 àti abínibí

Make your own games with GDevelop: Ṣẹ̀dá àwọn eré tìẹ pẹ̀lú GDevelop
GDevelop is an open-source, cross-platfo: GDevelop jẹ́ ètò orísun-gbangba kan fún ṣíṣẹ̀dá eré lórí èyíkéyìí ètò, tí a ṣe láti jẹ́ lílò fún gbogbo èèyàn - kò nílò àwọn ìmọ̀ nípa èdè kọ̀mpútà.
Unleash your creativity with GDevelop an: Unleash your creativity with GDevelop and create any kind of game: platformers, puzzles, shoot 'em up, strategy, [8-bit games](/make-8bit-pixelart-games)... Go through the examples or start a new project from scratch.
With GDevelop, you can make simple proje: With GDevelop, you can make simple projects for fun or create ambitious indie games like [Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH](/games/lil-bub-hello-earth), [Hyperspace Dogfights](/games/hyperspace-dogfights) and [tons of other games](/games-showcase)!
Events - game creation for everyone: Àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ - ṣíṣẹ̀dá eré fún gbogbo èèyàn
What makes GDevelop unique and so easy t: Nnkan tó mú GDevelop yàtọ̀ àti rọrùn láti lò ní àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà. Àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ jẹ́ ọ̀nà pàtàkì kan láti ṣàlàyé ìlànà eré rẹ, láì nílò láti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nípa èdè kọ̀mpútà.
Events being used in GDevelop to create: Àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tó n jẹ́ lílò lọ́wọ́ ní GDevelop láti ṣẹ̀dá ìlànà eré kan
When Space is pressed, the character ani: Nígbà tí Àlàfo bá gba títẹ̀, àwòrán abẹ̀mí òṣèré náà àti ohùn kan ma bẹ̀rẹ̀. Tí bọ́ǹbù kan bá kàn òṣèré náà, àwọn méjèèjì ma parun.
Export your game in one click: Ṣàgbéjáde eré rẹ ní títẹ̀ kan
Publish your games to the web, iOS, Andr: Publish your games to the web, iOS, Android, Windows, Mac, Linux and even [Facebook Messenger](/facebook-instant-games). Games created with GDevelop run anywhere and you can even do a one-click export to Android from the app.
Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, ma: Make games for iOS, Android, Windows, macOS and Linux
Laptop, tablets or phone: games made wit: Laptop, tablets or phone: games made with GDevelop can run everywhere
Express your ideas without being blocked: Express your ideas without being blocked: you can prototype new features on your games in minutes, and refine them without limits. [Making games](/games-showcase) as never been as easy as assembling your ideas with [the visual editors](/game-editors) provided by GDevelop.
Want to go even further? You can extend: Want to go even further? You can extend the [game engine with Javascript](/javascript-game-engine).
See how to add a trigger button to your: See how to add a trigger button to your platformer game in 90 seconds
[Tons of examples](/game-examples-starte: [Tons of examples](/game-examples-starters) are also available and ready to be tried in one click.
Tutorials for GDevelop and documentation: Àwọn àlàyé fún GDevelop àti àkọsílẹ̀ lórí wiki náà
Using JavaScript to make your games with: Lílo JavaScript láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn eré rẹ pẹ̀lú GDevelop
GDevelop supports JavaScript to create y: GDevelop n ṣe àtìlẹ́yìn JavaScript láti ṣẹ̀dá eré rẹ tàbí ṣàfikún sí ẹ̀rọ eré náà.
JavaScript can be used to write part of: JavaScript lè jẹ́ lílò láti kọ lára eré kan, ní ìfẹ̀gbẹ́kẹ̀gbẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀
Add JavaScript code blocks inside your g: Ṣàfikún àwọn búlọ́ọ̀kù kóòdù JavaScript sínú eré rẹ
GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code: GDevelop supports adding JavaScript code blocks at any point in the events of your game. It's a good way to implement a complex algorithm or reuse functions from open-source libraries. Events and code blocks can seamlessly be mixed together - so you can implement parts or even the totality of your game with JavaScript!
The JavaScript editor is based on the su: The JavaScript editor is based on the super powerful Monaco Editor, extracted from [Visual Studio Code](https://code.visualstudio.com/). Intellisense autocompletions are provided and the editor supports advanced features like multi-selection for faster coding.
Extend GDevelop with JavaScript extensio: Ṣàfikún sí GDevelop pẹ̀lú àwọn àfikún JavaScript
GDevelop is modular and can be extended: GDevelop is modular and can be extended to suit your needs. In particular, all features available to games (objects, behaviors, events) are based on the extension system. You can quickly create new extensions for your game or contribute to existing ones as GDevelop is [open-source](https://github.com/4ian/GD).
How to write extensions: Bí o ṣe lè kọ àwọn àfikún
The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. T: The Dark theme being used in GDevelop. The code editor also comes bundled with several beautiful themes!
Make your own 8-bit and pixelart games: Ṣẹ̀dá àwọn eré 8-bit àti pixelart tìẹ
Sprite editor and tools to make your own: Olóòtú sprite àti àwọn irinṣẹ́ láti ṣẹ̀dá àwọn eré 8bit tìẹ pẹ̀lú GDevelop
See Piskel sprite editor being used insi: Wo olóòtú sprite Piskel tó n jẹ́ lílò lọ́wọ́ nínú GDevelop láti ṣẹ̀dá eré 8bit kan
GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https:: GDevelop is bundled with [Piskel](https://www.piskelapp.com/), a powerful and easy to use 2D sprite editor. It's the perfect tool to create pixel art assets to give a retro feeling to your game! You can create objects with multiple animations, edit at any time the sprites and see the result by launching a preview of your game.
Ready-made behaviors: Àwọn ìhùwàsí tí a ṣẹ̀dá sílẹ̀
Want to create a retro platformer game?: Want to create a retro platformer game? GDevelop has a pre-made behaviors that you can attach to your character and your platforms. In a few seconds you have a basic platformer game running and ready to be customized and enhanced! Other behaviors, conditions and actions can also be used to create any kind of 2D games: shmup, "Bullet Hell", arcade games...
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH: a 8 bit game made with GDevelop
Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit g: Lil BUB's HELLO EARTH is a retro 8-bit game, with beautiful arts and soundtrack, which alternates between platformers levels, with hidden secrets, and shooter levels with bosses, multiple enemies and bonuses.
